messages.content: What is the capital of France?
The capital of France is Paris.
Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
What is the largest planet in our solar system?
Jupiter is the largest planet in our solar system.
I don't actually have favorites, but I can discuss colors and their properties!
How do you make chocolate chip cookies?
To make chocolate chip cookies, you'll need flour, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, and chocolate chips. Mix ingredients, form into balls, and bake at 350Â°F for about 10-12 minutes.
What's the difference between a crocodile and an alligator?

The main differences are in their snouts (alligators have U-shaped, wider snouts while crocodiles have V-shaped, pointer ones) and teeth arrangement (crocodiles show both upper and lower teeth when their mouth is closed, alligators only show upper teeth).
